title: Reagan on economy and foreign policy - reference

content.question: Reagan’s reference to “reaching our destination” most directly reflects which of the following political changes?

choices.label: The expanded influence of young people in politics
Bipartisan support for reform of the United States financial system
The rise of a new conservatism that challenged liberal views about the role of government
Increased political mobilization of labor unions

content.answer: The rise of a new conservatism that challenged liberal views about the role of government

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
